member.name: T:NuGet.Client.AnyFramework
member.summary: An internal NuGetFramework marker for ManagedCodeConventions. Most conventions disallow the string 'any' as a txm, so to allow it for conventions with no txm in the path we use this special type.

member.name: T:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions
member.summary: Defines all the package conventions used by Managed Code packages

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.AnyTargettedFile
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files targetted at a specific runtime and/or framework

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.RuntimeAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for loading as managed code assemblies at run-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.CompileAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for using as managed code references at compile-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.NativeLibraries
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for loading as native code libraries at run-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.ResourceAssemblies
member.summary: Pattern used to locate all files designed for loading as managed code resource assemblies at run-time

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.MSBuildFiles
member.summary: Pattern used to identify MSBuild targets and props files

member.name: P:NuGet.Client.ManagedCodeConventions.ManagedCodePatterns.ContentFiles
member.summary: Pattern used to identify content files

member.summary: Hash code creator, based on the original NuGet hash code combiner/ASP hash code combiner implementations
